channel.title: Comments on: Postscript to Rock’n’Roll Suicide

item.title: By: keir
item.dc:creator: keir
item.description: For a while someone was replying to each right-wing comment with this quote from the article, "Cynicism has become the default position on almost everything". I really enjoyed that.
item.content:encoded: For a while someone was replying to each right-wing comment with this quote from the article, “Cynicism has become the default position on almost everything”. I really enjoyed that.
